amendment.description: Amendment strikes 5 sections from title V of the bill which expand the lending authority of the Farm Credit System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to strike 5 sections from Title V of the bill which expand the lending authority of the Farm Credit System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
